name: Face Blowing a Kiss
baseMeaning: A yellow face with puckered lips blowing a small heart.
tldr: Sending love/kisses. More romantic than friendly, but used broadly.

contextMeanings.meaning: Sending a kiss to a romantic interest or partner.
Expressing affection to friends or family.
Showing appreciation or saying thanks cutely.
Generally too personal for professional contexts.

platformNotes.note: Common between romantic partners or close friends/family.
Used in comments to show love and appreciation.
Too personal for most workplace communication.

generationalNotes.note: Reserved for romantic contexts or close relationships.
Used broadly for affection - romantic or platonic.
May use generously with family and friends.

warnings.title: Romantic connotation
warnings.description: This emoji implies affection. Can be misinterpreted as flirty in the wrong context.
